opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: American Legion Post No. 51 v. Pennsylvania

opinion:
363 U.S. 720

80 S.Ct. 1596

4 L.Ed.2d 1521

AMERICAN LEGION POST NO. 51
v.
PENNSYLVANIA.

No. 881.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 20, 1960

Mr. Anthony Cavalcante, for appellant.

Anne X. Alpern, Atty. Gen. of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Frank P. Lawley, Jr., Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a properly presented and substantial federal question.
